import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; import Helmet from "../components/Helmet/Helmet"; import CommonSection from "../components/UI/CommonSection"; import "../styles/checkout.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Checkout = () => { const totalQty = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalQuantity); const totalAmount = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalAmount); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (
Billing Information
Total Qty: {totalQty} items
Subtotal${totalAmount}
{" "} Shipping:
free shipping $0

Total Const: ${totalAmount}

); }; export default Checkout;
